titleStmt.title: The country-man's petition for a Parliament. The humble petition of Mr. Barnaby Clod, a well-descended person, most humbly, and most obediently, and most submissively shewing, and expressing, and declaring unto your great Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Clod, Barnaby. aut

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
